EmailTemplate.subject: SAVE THE DATE: Join AECOM at the Serpentine Gallery Pavilion
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Join AECOM at the Serpentine Gallery Pavilion
AECOM invites you to join us for an evening of drinks and canap√©s to celebrate the opening of this year's Serpentine Gallery Pavilion.
Architecture by Smiljan Radic Engineering and technical design, cost management and project management by AECOM.
Please look out for your invitation in the post, or use the contact details below to RSVP and confirm your attendance.
On: Wednesday 16 July, 18.30-22.30
At: Serpentine Gallery, Kensington Gardens, London W2 3XA
RSVP
Please RSVP by 2 July 2014:
E: RSVPserpentine.europe@aecom.com T: +44 (0)20 7645 2017
